original_text: Then you shall take the garments, and put on Aaron the coat and the robe of the ephod, and the ephod, and the breastpiece, and gird him with the skillfully woven band of the ephod.
korean_text: 의복을 가져다가 아론에게 속옷과 에봇 받침 겉옷과 에봇을 입히고 흉패를 달고 에봇에 정교하게 짠 띠를 띠게 하고

sentences.original_text: Then you shall take the garments,
and put on Aaron the coat,
and the robe of the ephod,
and gird him with the skillfully woven band of the ephod.
sentences.korean_translation: 공교하게 만든 에봇의 띠로 그를 띠우라.
